name: @onsol/contracts-ethereum
description: Onsol Bridge Name Service Etheruem contracts

scripts.test: mkdir -p build/contracts && cp node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/build/contracts/* build/contracts/ && truffle test --network test
scripts.migrate: mkdir -p build/contracts && cp node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/build/contracts/* build/contracts/ && truffle migrate --to 4
scripts.deploy-batched-vaa-sender: mkdir -p build/contracts && cp node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/build/contracts/* build/contracts/ && truffle migrate --f 10 --to 10
